sections.title: Plan and Fund Big Goals
sections.subtitle: Trips, down payments, education — make them real

sections.title: Timeline + Amount = Plan
sections.content: Turn big goals into monthly amounts. Break totals into smaller, predictable contributions.

sections.title: Proportion Rule
sections.content: Fund long-term goals at least a little each month to maintain momentum.

sections.title: Pro Tip
sections.content: Use separate sub-accounts for each big goal to avoid mixing funds.
